headline.main: Bombing of Japan Held Feasible; Attacks Expected 'in Good Time'; Strong Strategic Bases Still Held by Allies -- Need for Air Reinforcement Underlined by Good Long-Range Prospect

lead_paragraph: SINGAPORE, Dec. 31 (Delayed) -- The development of Allied-Japanese hostilities in this part of the world is proving anew the vital importance of air power.
snippet: SINGAPORE, Dec. 31 (Delayed) -- The development of Allied-Japanese hostilities in this part of the world is proving anew the vital importance of air power....

byline.original: By F. TILLMAN DURDINWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
